DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to study normal sonographic(ultrasound)anatomy of the soft tissues of the foot in normal volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Sonographic Features of Normal Soft Tissues of the Feet
DOC.detailed_description: To study normal sonographic anatomy of soft tissues of the foot [which include Extensor retinaculum, sinus tarsi, ligaments and tendons, spring ligament and their attachments to underlying bones] in asymptomatic individuals/volunteers.
DOC.criteria: 18 years of age and older no disease or abnormality of the feet abnormality of the feet
